mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Post (userId, categoryId, title, content, viewCount) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{category.id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Post p LEFT JOIN User u ON p.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN Category c ON p.categoryId = c.id WHERE p.id=#{id}

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.createdAt, u.id AS userId, u.username, c.id AS categoryId, c.cateName FROM Post p LEFT JOIN User u ON p.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN Category c ON p.categoryId = c.id WHERE p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%') GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.createdAt, u.id, u.username, c.id, c.cateName ORDER BY p.createdAt LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.createdAt, u.id AS userId, u.username, c.id AS categoryId, c.cateName FROM Post p LEFT JOIN User u ON p.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN Category c ON p.categoryId = c.id WHERE p.userId=#{userId} GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.createdAt, u.id, u.username, c.id, c.cateName ORDER BY p.createdAt
SELECT viewCount FROM Post WHERE id = #{postId};
mapper.update: UPDATE Post SET viewCount = viewCount+1 WHERE id=#{postId}
UPDATE Post SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, categoryId=#{category.id} WHERE id=#{id}
